attributes.review:
The moment I opened this simply repulsive app I was greeted by a whole d*rito? EXCUSE ME? Frankly, I am ALLERGIC. To such a chip brand. So, *naturally* I was immediately upmost REVOLTED and I still to this current moment. I feel PAINFULLY disrespected in my rights to being comfortable on the internet, let alone whilst seated in the SUPPOSED COMFORT OF MY **OWN ROOM.** I find the apps contents to be heavily triggering to me as d*rito’s are a highly sensitive topic to me. After all, I received NO TRIGGER WARNINGS; of which are STRONGLY advised in Modern Culture. With this stated, I’d heavily appreciate and advise you to consider taking this app DOWN because I, as a human being should have my trigger’s like everyone else’s. How could anyone be so PAINFULLY INCONSIDERATE ANYWAYS? Seeing such a *vile* image could cause many innocent viewers panic attacks, traumatic flashbacks, severe and unnecessary anger, and MUCH. MORE. I am THR UTMOST ASHAMED! In the infamous apps creators; and I, as a man with *CLEARLY* more respect towards equality of all races, genders, sexualities and so on, I WILL be contacting your mother to inform her of this apps wrongdoings.

And for those just reading, have this!
Je Te Laisserai Des Mots - Patrick Watson
—
Je te laisserai des mots,
En dessous de ta Porte,
En dessous de la line qui chante,
Tout pres de la place, ou tes pieds passent,
Cache dans les trous de temps d’hiver,
Et quand tu es seule pendant un instant,
Embrasse moi,
Quand tu voudras. 
Embrasse moi,
Quand tu voudras.
Embrasse moi,
Quand tu voudras. 
—
I thought a French song might be nice to calm anyone whose going through these reviews in low spirits!! It’s a relatively short song, but it’s sweet and calms me down, so I thought maybe it’d make you feel a little better too!! Have a good day, and drink your water. :]
attributes.title: WHAT IS THIS😭😭
